Quote: "The truth will set you free. But first, it will piss you off"
Author: Gloria Steinem

Quote: "In battle use the ordinary to engage use the extraordinary to win"
Author: Sun Tzu

Quote: "Ti lamp, ti lamp. Ti hache i coup’ gros bois"
Author: Haitian Proverb

Quote: "The greater the mass, the greater the force of attraction"
Author: Isaac Newton

Quote: "Not everything that counts can be counted, and not everything that can be counted counts"
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: "I call her CNN, yeah ’cause baby, you old news"
Author: Kanye West

Quote: "The modern organization cannot be an organization of 'boss' and 'subordinate'- it must be organized as a team of associates"
Author: Peter Drucker

Quote: "The perfect is the enemy of the good. - « Le mieux est l'ennemi du bien »"
Author: Voltaire

Quote: "Celui qui abandonne une fois, le fera toujours"
Author: Charles de Foucauld

Quote: "Another person will not hurt you without your cooperation. You are hurt the moment you believe yourself to be"
Author: Epictetus
